## ForceBodySizeOptions interface

An object describing customization for the force body feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ForceBodySizeOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [forceHeight](./webshell.forcebodysizeoptions.forceheight.md) | boolean | Force body width to <code>heightValue</code>. |
|  [forceWidth](./webshell.forcebodysizeoptions.forcewidth.md) | boolean | Force body width to <code>widthValue</code>. |
|  [heightValue](./webshell.forcebodysizeoptions.heightvalue.md) | number \| string | The height to override. |
|  [widthValue](./webshell.forcebodysizeoptions.widthvalue.md) | number \| string | The width to override. |
